description: Monitor your Load Test Live using this dashboard. Load Ingestion Tool : Jmeter, Data Source:Influx

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("rb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT (sum("countError")/sum("count") * 100 )  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("avg") FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("avg") FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT max("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (sum("count") - sum("countError")) / (sum("count")) FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE (("application" =~ /^$application$/) AND ("transaction" = 'all' ) AND (statut = 'all') ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT ( sum("countError")/sum("count")) FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT ((sum("count"))/(count("count")*5)) FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "avg" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"

SELECT last("min") AS Min, last("max") AS Max, last("avg") AS Avg, last("pct90.0") AS pct_90, sum("rb") as Received_Byte FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("statut" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"
SELECT mean("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "responseCode" !~ /^$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "responseCode","responseMessage","transaction"
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT    (sum("error")/sum("all")) as "error percentage" FROM (SELECT "count" as "all" FROM "jmeter" WHERE "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter), (SELECT "count" as "error" FROM "jmeter" WHERE "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' AND "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND $timeFilter)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "responseCode" !~ /^$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction","responseCode","responseMessage","transaction"
SELECT last("count") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("avg") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct90.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT ("counter_value") FROM "server_stats" WHERE ("counter_name" = 'disk_usage' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"
SELECT ("counter_value") FROM "server_stats" WHERE ("counter_name" = 'cpu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"
SELECT ("counter_value") FROM "server_stats" WHERE ("counter_name" = 'used_memory_mb') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"
SELECT ("counter_value") FROM "server_stats" WHERE ("counter_name" = 'available_memory_mb') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'
list.label: Transaction
list.name: transaction
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "events" WITH KEY = "tags"
list.name: build_number
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "events" WITH KEY = "tags"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "server_stats" WITH KEY = "server"
list.label: server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "server_stats" WITH KEY = "server"

title: Performance Dashboard
